Inline Select#

Component with input to choose numeric values and describe quantity.

You can add is-active class to disable each button. 

<section class="select-list">
    <label class="select-list_label">List</label>
    <div class="select-list_content">
    <button class="select-list_item">{{item[itemValue]}}</button>
    </div>
</section>

Use with colors
